allow: Bash(timeout 120 bash -c 'while true; do curl -s https://saudi-air-quality-monitor.streamlit.app/ | grep -o ""<title>[^<]*</title>"" && break; sleep 5; done')

Bash(timeout 120 bash -c 'while true; do result=$(curl -s https://saudi-air-quality-monitor.streamlit.app/ 2>/dev/null | grep -o ""<title>[^<]*</title>""); if [ -n ""$result"" ]; then echo ""$result""; break; fi; echo ""Waiting for deployment...""; sleep 10; done')
